backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature report describing required asset scan results screen and related frontend files.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of key frontend files involved in asset validation and theatre scene rendering.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining OKLCH color variables and theming for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point loading the React app through main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component controlling asset validation, missing-asset handling, scan-results overlay, and theatre scene rendering.
frontend/src/components/AssetScanResults: Overlay listing validated assets with success indicators and a Continue button.
frontend/src/components/BackgroundSilhou: Background component rendering a faint oversized logo silhouette behind all elements.
Centered hub logo with a faint halo rendered above the theatre scene.
frontend/src/components/MissingAssetOver: Full-screen blocking overlay showing the exact missing-asset error message.
frontend/src/components/TheatreStageScen: Cinematic theatre scene with curtains, seating, aisle lighting, and layered atmospheric effects.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and updating a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file for future React Query hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useRequiredAssets.ts: Hook validating required image assets on startup and reporting missing files or full validation results.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, global CSS variables for light/dark themes, layout resets, and utility additions including a radial gradient class.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and an Internet Identity provider before rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom color tokens, extended theming, animations, and plugin integrations for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature requirements, and constraints for STEP 1 visual implementation and strict asset validation.
